Host::real_ip_addr_from_params ( $  ip_addr,
$  params = NULL 
) [static, private]

Obtains the real IP address using server parameters as a backup.

If the IP address is private, server parameters are used to obtain the real public IP address.

Parameters:
ip_addr The IP address.
params Parameters to initialize the receiver.
